titles.title: Lord Of The Valleys, Lord Of The Night

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord of the valleys,
Lord of the night,
A people in darkness
Have seen Your great light.
So we sing in the darkness,
We sing in Your light,
Our song drives away
All the birds of the night.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord of the valleys,
Lord of the night,
A people in hiding
Offer hearts prepared to fight.
So we sing in the darkness,
We sing as we fight,
Our song pierces through
All the voices of the night.
